content.name: dae
content.description: Information about Disk Array Enclosure (DAE) components in the storage system.

attributes.name: parentSystem
attributes.description: Parent system of the Disk Array Enclosure (DAE).

attributes.name: driveTypes
attributes.description: Disk type of the disks in the DAE.

attributes.name: avgPower
attributes.description: Average amount of power used by the DAE. The system uses a one hour window of  30-second samples to determine this value.

attributes.name: currentPower
attributes.description: Current amount of power used by the DAE.

attributes.name: emcPartNumber
attributes.description: EMC part number for the DAE.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: DAE name.

attributes.name: maxPower
attributes.description: Maximum amount of power used by the DAE. The system uses a one hour window of  30-second samples to determine this value.

attributes.name: needsReplacement
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the DAE needs replacement. Values are:
  • true - DAE needs replacement.
  • false - DAE does not need replacement.

attributes.name: health
attributes.description: Health information for the DAE, as defined by the health resource type.

attributes.name: manufacturer
attributes.description: Manufacturer of the DAE.

attributes.name: busId
attributes.description: Identifier of the bus used by the DAE.

attributes.name: parent
attributes.description: Resource type and unique identifier of the DAE's parent enclosure.

attributes.name: currentSpeed
attributes.description: Current speed of the DAE SAS disk connection.

attributes.name: currentTemperature
attributes.description: Current temperature of the DAE.

attributes.name: enclosureType
attributes.description: DAE enclosure type.

attributes.name: maxSpeed
attributes.description: Maximum speed of the DAE SAS disk connection. The system uses a one hour  window of 30-second samples to determine this value.

attributes.name: vendorSerialNumber
attributes.description: Vendor serial number for the DAE.

attributes.name: maxTemperature
attributes.description: Maximum temperature of the DAE. The system uses a one hour window of 30-second  samples to determine this value.

attributes.name: model
attributes.description: Manufacturer's model  number for the DAE.

attributes.name: vendorPartNumber
attributes.description: Vendor part number for the DAE.

attributes.name: avgTemperature
attributes.description: Average temperature of the DAE. The system uses a one hour window of 30-second  samples to determine this value.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the dae instance.

attributes.name: slotNumber
attributes.description: The enclosure number or position where the DAE is located on the bus.

attributes.name: emcSerialNumber
attributes.description: EMC serial number for the DAE.
